name: Galactic Defender (Infinity)
description:
This Game Was Made In 3 Days For The CMGT Game Jam By One Person Only And It Is Not Completely Finished But I Had To Publish It Before The Deadline.

In This Game You Have To Avoid Rocks And Shoot Down Enemies In Space, Also There Are Powerups That Give You Special Abilitys For A Duration But Some Of Them Are Bad And Don't Go Out Of The Playing Area Or You Will Explode.

Controls:

Mouse To Move SpaceShip

LMB To Shoot

enjoy ;)
